name: The Cane of Command (1h)
data: It has mediocre weapon class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users wisdom a bit.
It increases the users intelligence a bit.
It increases the users charisma a good amount.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives awesome bonus to the skill 'bargain'.
It gives awesome bonus to the skill 'leadership'.
It gives awesome bonus to the skill 'negotiate'.
